page.title: 18Where Fordham People Work.
page.content:
We asked the children at Fordham Primary School whether their parents worked and if so whether or not they worked in Fordham. These are the results of the questions we asked.
************************************** * * * Mums Dads * ************************************** * * * How many work? 54 74 * * * *____________________________________* * * * How many work 30 24 * * in Fordham? * *____________________________________* * * * How many work 24 50 * *out of Fordham? * **************************************
